vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Εὐνίκη (Rec. -νείκη), -ης,
Eunice, Timothy's mother: 2Ti.1:5.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A woman living at the time of the New Testament, only mentioned at 2Ti.1.5; her mother was Lois (G3090);
mother of: Timothy (G5095)
§ Eunice, "good victory"
Eunice, (Proper name), 2Tim. 1:5*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
友尼基 这个陰性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "非常勝利"
提摩太的母親 (提後 1:5)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
友尼基 这个阴性专有名词在原文的意思是 "非常胜利"
提摩太的母亲 (提后 1:5)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: Ơ-nít; Êu-nít «được ban phước với thắng trận »: mẹ của Ti-mô-thê. εὖ (G2095) + νίκη (G3529)
